content.raw: This error happened while trying to set the tags on the field computer: AWS reported the instance to be inexistent. The instance does exist, however (see image), and this it the first report of such a problem. LOG: cloudsimd.py launch error: EC2ResponseError: 400 Bad Request InvalidInstanceID.NotFoundThe instance ID 'i-ec9bf39c' does not existc77fc68d-506d-4281-b896-0939ac40f6f7 LOG: traceback: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/var/cloudsimd/cloudsimd.py", line 111, in launch launch(username, constellation_name, tags, credentials_ec2, constellation_directory) File "/var/cloudsimd/launchers/vpc_trio.py", line 137, in launch CONFIGURATION) File "/var/cloudsimd/launchers/vpc_trio.py", line 612, in trio_launch ec2conn.create_tags([ robot_aws_id ], robot_tags) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/boto/ec2/connection.py", line 3203, in create_tags return self.get_status('CreateTags', params, verb='POST') File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/boto/connection.py", line 1019, in get_status raise self.ResponseError(response.status, response.reason, body) EC2ResponseError: EC2ResponseError: 400 Bad Request InvalidInstanceID.NotFoundThe instance ID 'i-ec9bf39c' does not existc77fc68d-506d-4281-b896-0939ac40f6f7
content.html:
This error happened while trying to set the tags on the field computer: AWS reported the instance to be inexistent. The instance does exist, however (see image), and this it the first report of such a problem.

LOG: cloudsimd.py launch error: EC2ResponseError: 400 Bad Request <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <Response><Errors><Error><Code>InvalidInstanceID.NotFound</Code><Message>The instance ID 'i-ec9bf39c' does not exist</Message></Error></Errors><RequestID>c77fc68d-506d-4281-b896-0939ac40f6f7</RequestID></Response> LOG: traceback: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/var/cloudsimd/cloudsimd.py", line 111, in launch launch(username, constellation_name, tags, credentials_ec2, constellation_directory) File "/var/cloudsimd/launchers/vpc_trio.py", line 137, in launch CONFIGURATION) File "/var/cloudsimd/launchers/vpc_trio.py", line 612, in trio_launch ec2conn.create_tags([ robot_aws_id ], robot_tags) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/boto/ec2/connection.py", line 3203, in create_tags return self.get_status('CreateTags', params, verb='POST') File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/boto/connection.py", line 1019, in get_status raise self.ResponseError(response.status, response.reason, body) EC2ResponseError: EC2ResponseError: 400 Bad Request <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <Response><Errors><Error><Code>InvalidInstanceID.NotFound</Code><Message>The instance ID 'i-ec9bf39c' does not exist</Message></Error></Errors><RequestID>c77fc68d-506d-4281-b896-0939ac40f6f7</RequestID></Response>
